person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Peter Nicol ( Scotland ) beat Simon Parke ( England ) 15-7 15-12 15-12 Rodney Eyles ( Australia ) beat Mark Cairns ( England ) 15-7 15-6 15-8 .

Let's think step by step.

1. Peter Nicol (Scotland)
2. Simon Parke (England)
3. Rodney Eyles (Australia)
4. Mark Cairns (England)

These are the "Person" entities mentioned in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Peter Nicol
2. Simon Parke
3. Rodney Eyles
4. Mark Cairns

These are the entities that clearly refer to persons mentioned in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Peter Nicol |
| Simon Parke |
| Rodney Eyles |
| Mark Cairns |

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Peter Nicol ( Scotland ) beat Simon Parke ( England ) 15-7 15-12 15-12 Rodney Eyles ( Australia ) beat Mark Cairns ( England ) 15-7 15-6 15-8 .

Let's think step by step.

1. Scotland (Mentioned next to Peter Nicol's name)
2. England (Mentioned next to the names of Simon Parke, Mark Cairns, and twice as a nationality)
3. Australia (Mentioned next to Rodney Eyles' name)

So, the location entities in the paragraph are Scotland, England, and Australia.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

1. Scotland
2. England
3. Australia

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to locations.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Peter Nicol ( Scotland ) beat Simon Parke ( England ) 15-7 15-12 15-12 Rodney Eyles ( Australia ) beat Mark Cairns ( England ) 15-7 15-6 15-8 .

Let's think step by step.

1. Scotland (represented by Peter Nicol)
2. England (represented by Simon Parke and Mark Cairns)
3. Australia (represented by Rodney Eyles)

These entities are organizations in the sense that they are countries or teams. The individuals named are just representatives of those organizations in the given context.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

1. Scotland
2. England
3. Australia

These are the entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to organizations.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
